tweet: I voted to protect the Second Amendment and oppose H.R. 8. H.R. 8 would not prevent gun violence. It would make the exercise of Second Amendment freedoms and the right to self-defense more difficult for law-abiding citizens.

I am sorry to learn that Trooper Lucas B. Dowell of the Virginia State Police was killed in the line of duty. He was a native of Chilhowie and had served in the State Police since 2014. His family is in my thoughts and prayers. May we never forget his sacrifice.
